titleStmt.title: An act impowering the militia of the city of London to raise horse
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print dated 15 Aug. 1651.
Signatures: 11D-11D2. Also issued as part of a through-paged set with a table for the entire set added.
Last word of first line of text: "An"; first word of line below initial: "pointed"; last word of last full line on page: "be-".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
